languages.text: "Мы не могли просто поговорить? Без испытаний?"
"Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"
languages.original_text: "Мы не могли просто поговорить? Без испытаний?"

traits.locale_text: "Could we not have just talked? Without any trials?"
"Could we not have just talked? Without any trials?"
"Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"
"Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"
"Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"
"Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"

languages.text: "Waren die Prüfungen wirklich nötig? Hätte ein Gespräch nicht gereicht?"
languages.original_text: "Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"

traits.locale_text: "Waren die Prüfungen wirklich nötig? Hätte ein Gespräch nicht gereicht?"

languages.text: «¿Eran necesarias las pruebas? ¿No podíamos haber mantenido una conversación?».
languages.original_text: "Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Eran necesarias las pruebas? ¿No podíamos haber mantenido una conversación?».

languages.text: 「試練は本当に必要だったのか？会話だけでは足りなかったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"

traits.locale_text: 「試練は本当に必要だったのか？会話だけでは足りなかったのか？」

languages.text: “真的有必要搞这些试炼吗？面对面谈谈还不够吗？”
languages.original_text: "Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"

traits.locale_text: “真的有必要搞这些试炼吗？面对面谈谈还不够吗？”

languages.text: « Était-il vraiment nécessaire d'en passer par ces épreuves ? Une conversation n'aurait-elle pas suffi ? »
languages.original_text: "Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"

traits.locale_text: « Était-il vraiment nécessaire d'en passer par ces épreuves ? Une conversation n'aurait-elle pas suffi ? »

languages.text: "Bu imtihanlar gerçekten gerekli miydi? Konuşsak yetmez miydi?"
languages.original_text: "Were the trials truly necessary? Would not a conversation have sufficed?"
